summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3763 for the improvement of Eddy Street, from 57th Avenue South to the northwest corner of Lot 5, Block 17, Brighton Beach Addition, by grading and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 46283, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
